Uses of Interface
org.springframework.boot.availability.ApplicationAvailability

Packages that use ApplicationAvailability
Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.availability
Auto-configuration that extends health endpoints so that they can be used as availability probes.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.availability
Actuator support for application availability concerns.
org.springframework.boot.availability
Support for describing the availability of Spring Boot applications.
